error.cannot_connect:

abort.already_configured: This WiiM device is already configured

play_url.name: Play URL
play_url.description: Play audio from a URL (radio streams, files, etc.).

url.name: URL
url.description: URL of the media to play (e.g., http://stream.example.com/radio.mp3).

play_preset.name: Play Preset
play_preset.description: Play a hardware preset configured in the WiiM app. Due to WiiM firmware behavior, presets may automatically resume after a few seconds when switching to external sources.

preset.name: Preset Number
preset.description: Preset number to play (1-20, device dependent).

play_playlist.name: Play Playlist
play_playlist.description: Play an M3U playlist from a URL.

playlist_url.name: Playlist URL
playlist_url.description: URL of the M3U playlist file.

set_eq.name: Set Equalizer
set_eq.description: Set the equalizer preset or custom 10-band values.

preset.name: EQ Preset
preset.description: Preset name (flat, classical, jazz, vocal, pop, rock, dance, country, blues, custom).

custom_values.name: Custom EQ Values
custom_values.description: 10-band EQ values (-12 to +12 dB per band). Required when preset is 'custom'.

play_notification.name: Play Notification
play_notification.description: Play a notification sound. The device automatically lowers current playback, plays the notification, then restores volume.

url.name: Notification URL
url.description: URL of the notification sound to play.

reboot_device.name: Reboot Device
reboot_device.description: Reboot the WiiM device. The device will be temporarily unavailable during restart.

sync_time.name: Sync Time
sync_time.description: Synchronize the device clock with Home Assistant's time.

set_sleep_timer.name: Set Sleep Timer
set_sleep_timer.description: Set a sleep timer to automatically stop playback after a specified duration.

sleep_time.name: Sleep Time
sleep_time.description: Time in seconds until the device stops playback (0-7200, i.e., up to 2 hours).

update_alarm.name: Update Alarm
update_alarm.description: Create or update an alarm on the WiiM device. WiiM devices support 3 alarm slots (0-2). Alarm times must be in UTC format.

alarm_id.name: Alarm ID
alarm_id.description: The alarm slot to update (0, 1, or 2).

time.name: Time
time.description: Alarm time in UTC (HH:MM:SS format, e.g., '07:00:00').

play_queue.name: Play Queue
play_queue.description: Start playing from a specific position in the queue. Requires UPnP support.

queue_position.name: Queue Position
queue_position.description: Position in queue to start playing (0-based index).

remove_from_queue.name: Remove From Queue
remove_from_queue.description: Remove an item from the playback queue at a specific position. Requires UPnP support.

queue_position.name: Queue Position
queue_position.description: Position in queue to remove (0-based index).

get_queue.name: Get Queue
get_queue.description: Get the current queue contents with metadata (title, artist, album, URL). Requires UPnP ContentDirectory support (WiiM Amp/Ultra + USB only).

scan_bluetooth.name: Scan for Bluetooth Devices
scan_bluetooth.description: Scan for nearby Bluetooth devices. This uses unofficial API endpoints and may not work on all firmware versions.

duration.name: Scan Duration
duration.description: How long to scan in seconds (3-10 recommended).

set_channel_balance.name: Set Channel Balance
set_channel_balance.description: Adjust the left/right channel balance. This uses unofficial API endpoints and may not work on all firmware versions.

balance.name: Balance
balance.description: Balance from -1.0 (full left) to 1.0 (full right). 0.0 is center.
